mema shasthriya ho buddhimaya kathikawa sidu kala lokuma badhawa wuye rate samastha gatalu therum kara ganimata, mathukara ganimata saha pahadili kara ganimata awahira wana aakarayen eelam gataluwa nithara nithara, hama thanakadima, rate athi ekama ha wishalama gataluwa lesa mathukara dakwimayi.ee nisama owunta anuwa eya rate athi ekama “jathika prashnaya” noesenam “jathika gataluwa“ bawata pathwima apa kawuruth athdutu deyaki. 1977 n pasuwa wardhanaya wu nawa libaralwadi aarthika wenaswim nisa athi wu barapathala aadayam wishamatha, ee nisama samajaya thula widyamana wu duppathunge saha pohosathunge maha paratharaya, eseth nathahoth bahu paribhojanawadinge saha hullannange maha paratharayak samajaya thula wardhanaya wu bawath in pasuwa mathu wu wargika, tharuna, gowi, kamkaru, wruththiya, siwil gatum ho aragala wanahi 77 n pasu athi wu thaththwaye wiwidha prakasha wim bawath wataha dima sandaha kisidu adhyayanamaya udawwak mema eelamwadi buddhimathungen ho eelamwadi shasthriya kathikawen samajayata labune naha.ee wenuwata siddha wuye eelam aragalaya yanna suwisheshi, swayaththa wargikamaya ananyatha deshapalana hethun matha ipadunu ekak bawath ee sandaha wisanduma suwisheshi lesa “janawargika gataluwa“ wisandima sandahama wenwu suwisheshi ekak wiya yuthu bawatath arthakathana saha pahadili kirim sapayimayi.nawa libaral wadayamehi thawath paththak da thibena bawa penwa dimata kamaththemi.
